thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Alteryx Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alteryx Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Alteryx Inc:
* ALTERYX ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 TO $0.07
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $176 MILLION TO $179 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $39 MILLION TO $40 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.24 TO $0.29
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 55 PERCENT TO $38.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
